hakam <Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Olga Bakhareva <Olga.Bakhareva@chalhoub.com <mailto:Olga.Bakhareva@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Dubai mall Screen not working 

 

Hello Majdi 

 

kindly check the message from RSO team , regarding the store screen ,  

Dear Guess Dubai Mall, 

New note has been added by: Sharon Pinto to Form: FRM#73657
for store: GUESS - Dubai Mall - Boutique:

Please advise on the scope of work.
Also due to expiry of the store insurance, we have requested for the insurance from the concerned team.
As mall is rejecting all permits.
will apply once received.
Thanks

Regards 


--------------------------------------------------
